repos.name: dotfiles
repos.description: Gabriel's config files (zsh, tmux, git, etc) + backups, brew installs, coding agents and macOS setup.
repos.summary: Personal configuration management system for macOS that syncs shell, terminal, editor, and development tool dotfiles from a git repository while supporting selective installation of dependencies, applications, and coding agents. Includes automated backup/restore functionality via Mackup and provides security auditing, pre-commit hooks, and baseline validation for maintaining machine consistency. Designed for modular setup where users can fork, review, and customize which components to install before syncing to their home directory.

repos.name: orchestrator
repos.description: A lightweight bash autonomous coding agents orchestrator.
repos.summary: A lightweight bash-based orchestrator that manages autonomous coding tasks by routing them to specialized AI agents (Claude, Codex, OpenCode) with dynamic skill selection and delegation support. Tasks are defined in YAML and agents execute with full tool access, capable of spawning subtasks and maintaining context across multiple executions. The system provides CLI commands for task management, agent coordination, and optional GitHub integration.

repos.name: skills
repos.description: A collection of independent, self-contained skills for AI agents.
repos.summary: A collection of independent, self-contained skills for AI agents that follow the Agent Skills open standard, each with its own directory, documentation, and configuration via environment variables. Skills can be installed into Claude Code, Codex, OpenClaw, or other compatible agents by copying the skill directory and running a setup script to configure dependencies and API keys. The repository includes skills for GitHub management, crypto pricing, voice synthesis, Solana auditing, and many other specialized tasks that extend agent capabilities.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich
repos.summary: for Gabriel Koerich, a software engineer and entrepreneur with 17+ years of experience specializing in Rust, Solana smart contract development, and DeFi protocols. Currently architecting smart contracts at Lulo Finance and previously founded Bulldesk, a marketing automation SaaS acquired in 2021.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich.github.io
repos.description: Projects & Work

repos.name: claudio
repos.description: Personal clawdbot with memory, subagents, cron schedules, projects and configurations.

repos.name: bean
repos.description: Personal (or not) finance, accounting, defi/quant investments, projects and ideas.
repos.summary: A personal finance and quantitative investing platform that combines plaintext accounting with Beancount, financial data imports from multiple sources, and investment screening/portfolio analysis tools. The project includes a knowledge base, notebook analyses, and invoice generation, with planned features for stock screeners using magic formula and factor-based rankings. Integrates B3, Nasdaq, and Yahoo data sources for comprehensive financial tracking and investment decision-making.

repos.name: bot
repos.summary: A TypeScript trading bot for cryptocurrency markets that supports multiple technical analysis strategies including SMA Crossover, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SuperTrend, and Smart Money Concepts analysis for trade execution across different exchanges and protocols. The bot provides real-time market data fetching, continuous candle streaming, and strategy combination framework configured through YAML files.

repos.name: passive-trading
repos.summary: A cryptocurrency trading bot written in Python and Rust that operates on perpetual futures markets across multiple exchanges (Bybit, OKX, Bitget, GateIO, Binance, Kucoin, Hyperliquid, and Drift) by automatically creating and cancelling limit orders using a contrarian market-making strategy. It employs a Martingale-inspired approach with grid-based entries, trailing orders, and dynamic market selection to manage positions with minimal user intervention. The bot includes backtesting and optimization tools with CPU-heavy functions written in Rust for performance.

repos.name: trader-smith
repos.summary: An autonomous trading agent for Hyperliquid perpetual futures featuring modular architecture, advanced risk management, and real-time monitoring. The v2.0 refactor transforms the codebase into a clean, type-safe system with sophisticated market-making strategies and comprehensive error handling. Built with Python and designed for experienced traders who understand the inherent risks of algorithmic trading.

repos.name: cashier-iugu
repos.description: Iugu integration for Laravel Cashier

repos.name: solana-vault-example
repos.description: A minimal Solana-based tokenized vault implementation that accepts user deposits, mints vault shares (ERC-4626 style), and enables authorized investment into third-party protocols via Cross-Program Invocation (CPI)
repos.summary: A Solana-based tokenized vault that allows users to deposit SPL tokens and receive vault share tokens using ERC-4626-style exchange rate math, while enabling authorized accounts to invest vault assets into external protocols through Cross-Program Invocation. The system uses dual token support with SPL Token Program for vault assets and SPL Token-2022 for shares, featuring core instructions for vault initialization, user deposits with automatic share minting, and protocol integration for third-party investments.

repos.name: homebrew-tap
repos.description: Homebrew tap for orchestrator

repos.name: meshbot
repos.description: Friendly bot that can autonomously handle tasks or delegate to its smarter friends.
repos.summary: Multi-agent orchestration framework that autonomously routes tasks between specialized agents (planner, coder, reviewer, tester) with support for parallel execution, scheduling, and dynamic agent creation. Built on pi libraries with persistence, queue management, and channel gateways for Telegram and Discord integration. Includes workflow modes for delivery chains, campaigns, and self-iterating architect/tester loops with subagent-style isolated execution.

repos.name: smart-money-concepts
repos.description: A TypeScript implementation of Smart Money Concepts (SMC) / ICT methodology for market structure analysis. Detects order blocks, fair value gaps, breaks of structure, changes of character, liquidity grabs, and more.
repos.summary: A TypeScript library that analyzes financial market structure using Smart Money Concepts and ICT methodology, detecting patterns like order blocks, fair value gaps, and trend changes from OHLCV candle data. It processes market data in real-time or bulk, providing structured alerts and current market bias without any runtime dependencies. The library enables traders to identify key market zones and liquidity levels for technical analysis.

repos.name: report
repos.summary: A PHP project that provides reporting functionality with unit tests. It requires MySQL database setup, environment configuration, and uses Composer for dependency management. The project follows standard Laravel/PHP conventions with PHPUnit testing framework.

repos.name: partners
repos.summary: A PHP project with feature tests for a partner controller. Uses PHPUnit as the testing framework via Composer's vendor directory. Tests can be executed by running the phpunit command against the Feature test suite.

repos.name: private
repos.summary: A collection of utilities for managing privacy and data backup operations. Provides command-line tools and libraries for secure file handling and backup management. Designed to help users protect sensitive data through encryption and organized backup workflows.

repos.name: content-course
repos.description: Content Course landing page with Stripe & Solana payments
repos.summary: A high-converting landing page for selling digital courses that accepts payments through both Stripe (credit cards) and Solana (cryptocurrency), built with Nuxt.js 3 and Tailwind CSS. The project includes responsive design optimized for conversions, with optional Supabase integration for managing course access and webhook verification for secure payment processing. Deployed easily to Vercel with configurable pricing and support for multiple payment methods to reach both traditional and crypto-native audiences.

repos.name: portfolio-guardian-saas
repos.description: Portfolio Guardian SaaS - Monitor your Solana portfolio 24/7 with AI-powered insights
repos.summary: Portfolio Guardian is a full-stack SaaS application built with Nuxt.js and Supabase that enables users to monitor their Solana portfolios 24/7 with real-time balance tracking, P&L analytics, and AI-powered alerts. The platform supports multiple wallet connections, Drift perpetual position tracking, and offers tiered subscription plans with features like Telegram notifications and API access for professional traders. It's designed for deployment on Vercel and integrates voice features via ElevenLabs and OpenAI Whisper for enhanced user interaction.

repos.name: quant
repos.summary: A quantitative analysis and trading framework. The project appears to be focused on financial modeling, data analysis, or algorithmic trading capabilities.

repos.name: mind
repos.description: mind palace / writing / notes

repos.name: granatum-php
repos.description: A PHP 7+ library for the Granatum API.
repos.summary: A PHP 7+ library that provides integration with the Granatum API for financial management. It enables developers to interact with Granatum's financial services programmatically through a clean PHP interface. Designed for modern PHP applications requiring accounting and financial data access.

repos.name: addressing
repos.description: Brazilian postalcode to address in a service manager.
repos.summary: A service that converts Brazilian postal codes to addresses. Built as a simple utility for address lookup based on CEP (Brazilian postal code) input. Licensed under MIT.

repos.name: portfolio
repos.description: Portfolio Manager with multiple strategies with backtests, allocation checks + warning, suggestions for increase/decrease/exit/hedge positions. Deploy strategy using Docker. Built with rust with main focus execution on Solana, using Perps, borrow/lend and yield protocols.
repos.summary: A Rust-based portfolio manager that executes multiple trading strategies on Solana with support for perpetual futures, lending protocols, and yield farming. It provides backtesting capabilities, real-time allocation monitoring with warnings, and actionable suggestions for position management including entries, exits, and hedges. The system deploys as a containerized application via Docker for production use.

repos.name: home
repos.description: Home Containers
repos.summary: A set of containerized applications for managing home server infrastructure. This project organizes and deploys various services using container technology to provide a scalable and maintainable home computing environment. It enables isolated, modular services that can be easily configured, updated, and managed together.

repos.name: lulo-cpi-example
repos.description: Lulo Example CPI Integration
repos.summary: Solana program demonstrating User Vaults that integrate with Lulo via CPI to deposit and earn interest, allowing users to withdraw directly when sufficient funds are available or request async withdrawals through Lulo. The architecture supports both user vaults and can be adapted for Protocol Reserves with admin-only deposit and withdrawal capabilities.

repos.name: bliv
repos.summary: A Solana-based DeFi yield platform that enables users to liberate and optimize yields across protocols. The project includes smart contracts built with Anchor, a Next.js frontend deployed on Vercel, and a CLI tool for market management and testing on a local validator. It provides demo markets and token airdrops for development and testing purposes.

repos.name: service-manager
repos.description: A simple way to run services in sequence.
repos.summary: A tool that manages running services in sequence, providing a simple orchestration mechanism. The project is licensed under the MIT License and includes continuous integration with Travis CI.

repos.name: mev
repos.summary: A Rust-based starter template for building MEV bots on Solana that leverages Jito's searcher and geyser infrastructure. It includes a reference implementation of a backrunning arbitrage bot that monitors the mempool for large trades and executes profitable arbitrage routes across DEXes like Raydium and Orca. The template eliminates boilerplate by pinning shared dependencies and protobufs, allowing developers to focus on bot-specific logic.

repos.name: defi-automator
repos.description: Manage your DeFi like a quant fund
repos.summary: Tool for automating DeFi portfolio management on Solana's Orca Whirlpools, enabling users to create concentrated liquidity positions based on predefined algorithms with automatic rebalancing and fee collection. Currently supports strategies like One Tick Lower and One Tick Upper that initialize positions out of range to optimize yield capture as prices move. Designed to eventually expand to additional protocols and chains while providing quant fund-like portfolio management capabilities.

repos.name: bovespa.io
repos.description: bovespa.io
repos.summary: A Laravel-based web application for Brazilian stock market data (bovespa.io) that includes backend API functionality with PHP/Composer and a frontend built with Node.js, Bower, and Gulp. The project uses database migrations and seeds for data management, with PHPUnit for testing and code coverage reporting.

repos.name: guidelines
repos.description: My PHP, HTML, CSS and Javascript guidelines.
repos.summary: A collection of coding guidelines and best practices for PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development that enforces PSR-2/PSR-4 standards, consistent indentation, and English naming conventions. The project emphasizes clean code structure, proper documentation practices, and follows GitHub Flow for contributions with peer review requirements.

repos.name: solana-nft-marketplace
repos.description: NFT marketplace contract on Solana
repos.summary: A Solana NFT marketplace smart contract built with Anchor 0.18.2 that enables users to list NFTs, update prices, and purchase items while automatically collecting marketplace fees and distributing creator royalties. Originally developed for a 2021 hackathon, the contract includes core functionality for listing management and secure NFT trading on the Solana blockchain.

repos.name: classification
repos.summary: A Laravel application that classifies company attributes using an attribution classifier system. The project provides models and services to automatically categorize company data, with comprehensive test coverage to ensure classification accuracy.

repos.name: cross-domain
repos.summary: A stunningly fast PHP micro-framework for building web applications with expressive, elegant syntax that simplifies common development tasks like routing, database abstraction, queueing, and caching. Part of the Laravel ecosystem, Lumen is designed to make web development an enjoyable and creative experience while maintaining high performance. Open-sourced under the MIT license with official documentation available on the Lumen website.

repos.name: bulldesk-gridsome
repos.summary: A Vue.js-powered static site generator starter using Gridsome and Bootstrap that comes pre-configured with Forestry CMS, Netlify deployment, and markdown content management. It includes built-in features like Google Analytics, sitemap generation, and Netlify forms to enable rapid development and deployment of content-driven websites. The project is designed to work seamlessly with free tiers of Netlify, Forestry, and GitHub, making it accessible for developers without paid infrastructure costs.

repos.name: algorit
repos.description: WIP
repos.summary: A work-in-progress project combining a Vue.js frontend with Laravel Elixir, Sass, and Pug with a PHP and Lumen backend. The application uses HTML5 and modern tooling for both client and server-side development.

repos.name: basedash
repos.summary: A PHP-based web application framework built on Laravel that provides a dashboard interface with integrated asset management through npm, Bower, and Grunt. The project includes comprehensive testing infrastructure with PHPUnit and requires several PHP extensions including MCrypt and Intl for full functionality. It supports database migrations and seeding for rapid development setup.

repos.name: iafut-backend
repos.summary: PHP backend archetype for TodoBit projects built on the Slim framework with Twig templating, Eloquent ORM, and Phinx migrations, configured for Vagrant-based development. Provides a quick-start template for PHP projects with pre-configured database setup, Docker/Vagrant integration, and PSR-4 compliant class structure. Includes composer autoloading and seeders for rapid development and testing.

repos.name: algorit.com.br
repos.summary: A website for algorit.com.br with minimal documentation available. The project appears to be a domain-specific web application, though its specific purpose and functionality are not detailed in the provided README.
